DataElement.preferredName: Hormonal Contraception Within Past Three Month Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes or no response to indicate whether there is any use of hormonal contraceptives within the past three months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hormonal Contraception Within Past Three Month Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus._On the inside; contained in._Before the present time._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.

Concepts.definition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.

Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:Before the present time.:A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/19/2018 created for DCP SVAR MDA2017-09-03#SVAR12172018, wz.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Use of hormonal contraceptive
ReferenceDocuments.description: Use of hormonal contraceptives within the past 3 months
